abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Lepus townsendii Bachman, 1839" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Ibaraki Nature Museum, Mammals collection 1 records from RBINS DaRWIN 1 records from ISU Mammals 1 records from (UTC) University of Tennessee Mammals Collection 1 records from UAZ Mammals 1 records from UTEP Mammals (Arctos) 1 records from Palaeobiology - Vertebrate Fossils Collection - Mammalia - Royal Ontario Museum 1 records from Anymals+plants - Citizen Science Data 1 records from T. L. Hankinson Vertebrate Museum (EMU) Mammal Collection 1 records from UConn Mammals 1 records from University of Florida Vertebrate Paleontology 1 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Museum collection digitized at storage unit level 1 records from Natural History Museum (London) Collection Specimens 2 records from WNMU Mammal Collection (Arctos) 2 records from Schmidt Museum of Natural History_Mammals 2 records from Biodiversity Research and Teaching Collections - TCWC Vertebrates 2 records from UNR Mammalogy 2 records from Palaeobiology - Vertebrate Comparative Osteology Collection - Royal Ontario Museum 2 records from Angelo State Natural History Collections (ASNHC) - Mammalogy Collection 2 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 2 records from CUMV Mammal Collection 2 records from UAM Mammal Collection (Arctos) 2 records from HSU Wildlife Mammals 2 records from NHMO Mammal collection 2 records from Ohio State University Tetrapod Division - Mammal Collection (OSUM) 2 records from Macaulay Library Audio and Video Collection 3 records from Mammal specimens 3 records from SDNHM Mammology Collection 3 records from CHAS Mammalogy Collection (Arctos) 3 records from SBMNH Vertebrate Zoology 4 records from HSU Vertebrate Museum Mammals Collection 5 records from Mammals Specimens 5 records from TTU Mammals Collection 5 records from NCSM Mammals Collection 6 records from California State University, Long Beach Mammals 6 records from LACM Vertebrate Collection 7 records from SUI Vertebrate Collection 8 records from MSU Mammalogy, Ornithology and Vertebrate Paleontology Collections 10 records from Paleobiology Database 12 records from KUBI Vertebrate Paleontology Collection 15 records from UCLA Donald R. Dickey Bird and Mammal Collection 15 records from University of Alberta Museum of Zoology Mammalogy Collection (UAMZ) 18 records from CAS Mammalogy (MAM) 19 records from Cowan Tetrapod Collection - Mammals 20 records from PSM Vertebrates Collection 21 records from FHSM Mammals Collection 23 records from Vertebrate Zoology Division - Mammalogy, Yale Peabody Museum 24 records from CRCM Vertebrate Collection 25 records from University of California Museum of Paleontology 26 records from Mammalogy Collection - Royal Ontario Museum 28 records from UWBM Mammalogy Collection (Arctos) 28 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Zoology) Mammal Collection 32 records from Canadian Museum of Nature Mammal Collection 36 records from ISM Mammalogy Collection 44 records from MSB Mammal Collection (Arctos) 45 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University 52 records from UTEP Fossils (Arctos) 61 records from MVZ Mammal Collection (Arctos) 62 records from UWYMV Mammal Collection (Arctos) 65 records from AMNH Mammal Collections 95 records from UMNH Mammals Collection (Arctos) 98 records from UCM Mammal Collection (Arctos) 106 records from DMNS Mammal Collection (Arctos) 213 records from NatureServe Network Species Occurrence Data 227 records from NMNH Extant Specimen Records 235 records from KUBI Mammalogy Collection 692 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
